segments.text: I'm searching for an old music box .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You came to the right place . Any particular decade ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you had a box made in the ' 20s , that would be nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We just got one in yesterday , so now we have six .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would any of them have dancing figures ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we still have two boxes left that have dancing figures .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , they're both so beautiful . Let me have this one , I think .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That one truly is a beautiful piece of work , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no . Everything we sell here is â€˜ as is . '
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess I was asking for too much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If it breaks down , maybe you can find a repairman on the Internet .
segments.speaker: S2
